business_main.title:
Multi-Wire Saw Solutions that
Elevate Precision and Productivity
business_main.intro: IST Korea realizes high productivity and material utilization simultaneously with high-precision multi-wire saw technology optimized for cutting Silicon (Si) and SiC ingots.

what_is.title: What is Multi-Wire Saw?
what_is.desc1: Multi-wire saw is a cutting technology that simultaneously slices ingots using multiple diamond wires in parallel. This can dramatically increase productivity by creating multiple wafers in the same process.
what_is.desc2: In addition, precise tension control between wires and a multi-cutting structure result in small cutting loss (kerf) and cutting results with excellent surface quality.

items.title: Semiconductor Manufacturing
items.desc: Equipment optimized for Silicon (Si) and SiC wafer slicing processes, supporting high-quality wafer production.

items.title: Power Electronics / EV Industry
items.desc: SiC is spotlighted as a material for electric vehicles and inverters due to its high efficiency characteristics of power semiconductors, and multi-wire saws are also used for cutting these high value-added materials.

items.title: Substrate for Optoelectronics / LED / Display
items.desc: Cutting substrates such as Sapphire and GaN is also possible with multi-wire saws, making them suitable for producing LEDs and high-frequency components.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: IST Korea (hereinafter referred to as the 'Company') establishes and discloses the following privacy policy in order to protect the personal information of the information subject (customer) and to handle grievances related thereto promptly and smoothly in accordance with Article 30 of the Personal Information Protection Act.

sections.title: 1. Purpose of Processing Personal Information
sections.content:
The Company processes personal information for the following purposes and does not use it for purposes other than the following.
- Confirmation of customer intent to join, identification and authentication of oneself in accordance with the provision of services to customers, maintenance and management of membership qualifications, payment of amounts according to the supply of goods or services, supply and delivery of goods or services, etc.

sections.title: 2. Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information
sections.content:
① The Company processes and retains personal information within the period of retention and use of personal information agreed upon when collecting personal information from the information subject or the period of retention and use of personal information in accordance with laws and regulations.
② Specific personal information processing and retention periods are as follows.
- Customer subscription and management: Until the service use contract or membership withdrawal
- Records of contract or subscription withdrawal, payment, supply of goods, etc. in e-commerce: 5 years

sections.title: 3. Personal Information Items Processed
sections.content:
The Company processes the following personal information items for smooth service provision.
- Collected items: Name, phone number, mobile phone number, email, company name, position
- Collection method: Website, written form, telephone/fax, email

sections.title: 4. Destruction of Personal Information
sections.content: The Company destroys the personal information without delay when the personal information becomes unnecessary, such as the expiration of the personal information retention period or the achievement of the processing purpose.

sections.title: 5. Chief Privacy Officer
sections.content:
The Company designates a Chief Privacy Officer as follows to take general responsibility for personal information processing and to handle complaints and damage relief of information subjects related to personal information processing.

▶ Chief Privacy Officer
- Name: Administrator
- Position: Management Team Leader
- Contact: 054-461-6608, istkorea@istkorea.kr
